subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Tennessee, the No. 11 seed in the Midwest Region, overpowered No. 14 Mercer on the boards and was never seriously threatened in a victory in Raleigh, N.C.
snippet: Tennessee, the No. 11 seed in the Midwest Region, overpowered No. 14 Mercer on the boards and was never seriously threatened in a victory in Raleigh, N.C.
